Test Name: Congenital Disorders of Glycosylation (CDG) Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Whole blood (EDTA) or extracted genomic DNA
Purpose: Detection and interpretation of genetic variants in genes associated with Congenital Disorders of Glycosylation.
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), DNA extraction kit, gene-specific primer panel, library preparation kit, sequencing reagents, bioinformatics software
